name: Coercive Apparatus Expansion Index
summary: Coercive capacity, reach, and targeting are expanding, with uneven oversight and legal restraints.

components.name: Enforcement Capacity
components.summary: Detention footprint, tactical units, and specialized enforcement capacity have grown substantially.

components.name: Operational Reach
components.summary: Cross-jurisdictional task forces and authorities enable wide operational reach with limited friction.

components.name: Targeting & Impact
components.summary: Disparate impacts on specific communities and migrants are persistent and well-documented.

components.name: Oversight & Accountability (raw)
components.summary: Some inspectors general and courts are active, but gaps remain and remedies are uneven.

components.name: Legal Restraints (raw)
components.summary: Formal legal limits exist but are broad, contain carve-outs, or are subject to expansive interpretations.

notes: Scores are illustrative alpha values used to prototype the CAEI module.
In production, CAEI would be derived from detention capacity, task force authorities, litigation density, and statutory constraints.
